channel.title: Games on KamFurDev's Cool Website
channel.description: Recent content in Games on KamFurDev's Cool Website

item.title: Insert Randomness Update!
item.description: After a long break from making games, I’m working on games again! This was a project I was wanting to work on. The name Insert Randomness may seem stupid, but it’s to show that the game has a lot of random things going on in it. What this game will include: ℹ️ This is subject to change. A (hopefully not bad) story Weird Characters Text based graphics Being On All PC Platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux) Here is a link to the GitHub Page, but it’s in it’s early stages.
